legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: MAGA is doing everything they can to make sure no one who cares about progress, technology, discovery or American exceptionalism has a home on the right. We ought to be doing everything we can to make sure those people have a home on the left.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Ensure our universities can accept the best students in the world and that our companies can hire them. Fix H1B law so the system isn't gameable. Make it possible for H1Bs from India and China to rapidly get a green card.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Build a better, stronger NIH that invests in early-career scientists and ensures that great research like mRNA vaccination gets doubled down on, not half-ignored. Reduce time spent on writing grants. Restore the census and other invaluable public data sets.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Stand up for free speech, consistently, whether it's speech in our favor or against us. Pass new laws to restrict the ability of the Justice Department and other federal agents to engage in politically motivated prosecutions. You won't always be in power - make laws accordingly.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: The one thing that went fairly well under Biden was industrial policy. Look hard at what worked - the partnerships, the subsidies, the regulatory policy changes - and double down and do it even better. We do need to build in America.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: The frankly insane idea that the executive can impose tariffs any time they want at any value they want is awful for investment in American industries. Give that power back to Congress, which should use it to set tariffs to zero in nearly all cases.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Figure out why the government can't build things, and fix it.  Set insanely aggressive targets for housing affordability. No, more aggressive than that. No, more aggressive than that. Build cities that are the envy of the world, and that we can afford to live in.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Fix our schools. We know how to do it. Louisiana and Mississippi did it. Teach children to read with phonics. Teach children to read aggressively, obsessively - you can't teach them anything else if you fail at this.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Offer honors classes, offer accelerated classes, reject degrading of standards. Aim for every child to be challenged at the level they are at. Ban phones, and enforce the existing bipartisan law against TikTok.

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: Above all else, believe in America. Believe that the drugs we develop matter, that programs we run matter, that we are and ought to be an example and an envy of the world. If we don't believe in the importance of anything we do, how can we defend it when it's torched by Trump?

legacy.description: We are an independent investment research and financial media company. Not Investment Advice. Access our actionable data-driven research at https://t.co/7g2FfaekGA.
legacy.name: Hedgeye

result.text:
$EYE Don’t Lie: The Signal Was There

If you're just hearing about National Vision Holdings, Inc. ($EYE) and rushing to buy it at the open—stop. That’s not the Hedgeye process. That’s FOMO. The stock already moved from $9 to $19. You’re late if you’re chasing headlines.

But the opportunity isn’t gone. The same process that flagged the breakdown from $43 to $9 is now signaling a bullish phase transition. That’s what matters.

$EYE was a disaster—$43 to $9 while people kept buying lower highs: $43 → $27 → $23 → $9. Total collapse. 

But now? We’re seeing a higher low. Then bullish trade. Then bullish trend. When those levels converge, it’s one of the most bullish fractal setups we track.

And it’s not just the chart. Our Healthcare analyst Tom Tobin’s proprietary revenue data was front-running the signal. He’s hosting a Black Book call on $EYE this Thursday at 2:00pm ET. When signal, fundamentals, and Quad all align? That’s not noise. That’s conviction.

Tobin’s data shows accelerating revenue growth into easy comps. That’s no accident. The model’s built to catch it before it hits the tape.

Hedgeye CEO Keith McCullough broke this down live on The Macro Show this morning—because when a name makes that kind of move, it’s not random. It’s process.

Don't chase. Subscribe to The Macro Show to stay ahead of the pack. 
https://t.co/QvAzO1dDn4

legacy.description: recovering AI chatbot addict. mistake theorist. trying my best to be kind, and to respond constructively to good-faith criticism.
legacy.name: dweeb

legacy.full_text:
@KelseyTuoc Do you see a real path to the Democrats becoming the party of meritocracy?

(I’d love to read what you or anyone you respect might have to say about this topic)

legacy.description: In the reaching of a million men for a million dreams there will be miracles wrought that none of them could have directed.
legacy.name: Kelsey Piper

legacy.full_text: @dorkweeb I don't know, but I think the odds are high enough that it's worth trying, and higher than a lot of pessimists realize.
